results.title: Sono tornato
results.brief_description: Sono tornato (I’m Back) is a 2018 Italian satirical comedy film about Benito Mussolini directed by Luca Miniero, based on the German film Look Who’s Back, in turn based on the satirical novel of the same name.

constellations_other.name: Power and infamy
constellations_other.description: Beginning with an anamorphic image of Napoleon III, this Constellation focuses on representations of the distorted perspective of patriarchal power.

results.description: Sono tornato (I’m Back) is a 2018 Italian satirical comedy film about Benito Mussolini directed by Luca Miniero, based on the German film Look Who’s Back, in turn based on the satirical novel of the same name.
description_for_label: Sono tornato (I’m Back) is a 2018 Italian satirical comedy film about Benito Mussolini directed by Luca Miniero, based on the German film Look Who’s Back, in turn based on the satirical novel of the same name.

results.title: Some Like It Hot
results.brief_description: Two musicians witness a mob hit and struggle to find a way out of the city before they are found by the gangsters. Their only opportunity is to join an all-girl band as they leave on a tour.

constellations_other.name: Oscar-winning transformations and prosthetics
constellations_other.description: This Constellation explores how craft help actors undergo award-winning transformations into iconic characters.

results.description: Two musicians witness a mob hit and struggle to find a way out of the city before they are found by the gangsters. Their only opportunity is to join an all-girl band as they leave on a tour. To make their getaway they must first disguise themselves as women, then keep their identities secret and deal with the problems this brings - such as an attractive bandmate and a very determined suitor.
description_for_label: Two musicians witness a mob hit and struggle to find a way out of the city before they are found by the gangsters. Their only opportunity is to join an all-girl band as they leave on a tour. To make their getaway they must first disguise themselves as women, then keep their identities secret and deal with the problems this brings - such as an attractive bandmate and a very determined suitor.

results.title: Solaris
results.brief_description: A psychologist is sent to a space station orbiting a planet called Solaris to investigate the death of a doctor and the mental problems of cosmonauts on the station. He soon discovers that the water on the planet brings out repressed memories and obsessions.

constellations_other.name: Space, sci-fi and cinema fakes
constellations_other.description: Magic lantern slides were used to entertain and educate audiences in home, theatres and universities. While performers told jokes and fairytales, travelling showmen unveiled exotic locations and scientists revealed the latest discoveries.

constellations_other.name: Space, cinema and fakes
constellations_other.description: Before and after humans stepped foot on the moon, outer-space and the stars have inspired filmmakers, artists and game makers to imagine what's beyond our atmosphere.

results.description: A psychologist is sent to a space station orbiting a planet called Solaris to investigate the death of a doctor and the mental problems of cosmonauts on the station. He soon discovers that the water on the planet brings out repressed memories and obsessions.

creators_other.name: Creative Unit of Writers & Cinema Workers

results.title: Snowtown
results.brief_description: Based on true events, 16 year-old Jamie falls in with his mother’s new boyfriend and his crowd of self-appointed neighborhood watchmen, a relationship that leads to a spree of torture and murder.

constellations_other.name: Alice Babidge and True History of the Kelly Gang
constellations_other.description: An acclaimed set, costume, and production designer in the world of theatre, Alice Babidge has most recently been working in film including Justin Kurzel features Snowtown and True History Of The Kelly Gang.

results.description: Based on true events, 16 year-old Jamie falls in with his mother’s new boyfriend and his crowd of self-appointed neighborhood watchmen, a relationship that leads to a spree of torture and murder.
description_for_label: Based on true events, 16 year-old Jamie falls in with his mother’s new boyfriend and his crowd of self-appointed neighborhood watchmen, a relationship that leads to a spree of torture and murder.

results.title: Snowpiercer
results.creator_credit: Tomorrow Studios, Studio T, CJ Entertainment, Benjamin Legrand, Jacques Lob, Jean-Marc Rochette, Jiwon Park, MacKenzie Donaldson and Barry Robison
results.brief_description: Set more than seven years after the world has become a frozen wasteland, the remnants of humanity inhabit a gigantic, perpetually-moving train that circles the globe as class warfare, social injustice and the politics of survival play out.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Tomorrow Studios, Studio T, CJ Entertainment, Benjamin Legrand, Jacques Lob, Jean-Marc Rochette, Jiwon Park, MacKenzie Donaldson and Barry Robison
results.description: Set more than seven years after the world has become a frozen wasteland, the remnants of humanity inhabit a gigantic, perpetually-moving train that circles the globe as class warfare, social injustice and the politics of survival play out.

results.title: Snowpiercer
results.creator_credit: CJ Entertainment, Opus Pictures, Stillking Films, SnowPiercer, Moho Film, Union Investment Partners, Steven Nam, Kelly Masterson, Catherine George, Jeong Tae-sung, Benjamin Legrand, Jacques Lob, Jean-Marc Rochette, Bong Joon-ho, Ondrej Nekvasil, Baik, Miky Lee and Jeong Won-jo
results.headline_credit: Czech Republic, South Korea and United States of America, 2013
results.brief_description: In a future where a failed global-warming experiment kills off most life on the planet, a class system evolves aboard the Snowpiercer, a train that travels around the globe via a perpetual-motion engine.

constellations_other.name: There is no Planet B
constellations_other.description: While the climate emergency is very real, inspiring thousands and thousands of students to strike, documentaries, animated movies and dystopian genre films have warned about a world ravaged by global warming.

results.creator_credit_for_label: CJ Entertainment, Opus Pictures, Stillking Films, SnowPiercer, Moho Film, Union Investment Partners, Steven Nam, Kelly Masterson, Catherine George, Jeong Tae-sung, Benjamin Legrand, Jacques Lob, Jean-Marc Rochette, Bong Joon-ho, Ondrej Nekvasil, Baik, Miky Lee and Jeong Won-jo

results.title: Snowden
results.headline_credit: Germany and United States of America, 2016
results.brief_description: CIA employee Edward Snowden leaks thousands of classified documents to the press.

constellations_other.name: Orwell & Snowden
constellations_other.description: Explores Orwell as a representation of the NSA, and the infamous Snowden leak.

results.description: CIA employee Edward Snowden leaks thousands of classified documents to the press.
description_for_label: CIA employee Edward Snowden leaks thousands of classified documents to the press.

results.title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
results.creator_credit: Walt Disney Animation Studios, Merrill De Maris, Dorothy Ann Blank, Webb Smith, Bob Broughton, Walt Disney, David Hand, Ted Sears, Richard Creedon, Otto Englander, Dick Rickard, Earl Hurd and Virginia Lockwood
results.brief_description: Snow White, takes refuge in the forest in the house of seven dwarfs to hide from her stepmother, the wicked Queen. The Queen is jealous because she wants to be “the fairest in the land,” and Snow White’s beauty surpasses her own.

constellations_other.name: Cautionary tales and magic lantern projectors
constellations_other.description: Early magic lantern projections depicted cautionary religious scenes and fairytales, just like cinema did in its infancy.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Walt Disney Animation Studios, Merrill De Maris, Dorothy Ann Blank, Webb Smith, Bob Broughton, Walt Disney, David Hand, Ted Sears, Richard Creedon, Otto Englander, Dick Rickard, Earl Hurd and Virginia Lockwood
results.description: A beautiful girl, Snow White, takes refuge in the forest in the house of seven dwarfs to hide from her stepmother, the wicked Queen. The Queen is jealous because she wants to be known as “the fairest in the land,” and Snow White’s beauty surpasses her own.
description_for_label: A beautiful girl, Snow White, takes refuge in the forest in the house of seven dwarfs to hide from her stepmother, the wicked Queen. The Queen is jealous because she wants to be known as “the fairest in the land,” and Snow White’s beauty surpasses her own.

results.title: Snow-White
results.brief_description: Trouble starts when the queen’s magic mirror says Betty Boop is fairest.

constellations_other.name: MoCaps and rotos
constellations_other.description: Though VFX continues to push boundaries and brings fantastical worlds and creatures to life, there's still a place for classic animation techniques.

results.description: Trouble starts when the queen’s magic mirror says Betty Boop is fairest.
description_for_label: Trouble starts when the queen’s magic mirror says Betty Boop is fairest.

results.title: Smash His Camera
results.brief_description: A film centering on the life and work of Ron Galella that examines the nature and effect of paparazzi.

constellations_other.name: Papa-paparazzi
constellations_other.description: Media attention and paparazzi from the assassination of JFK to Lady Gaga's music video.

results.description: A film centering on the life and work of Ron Galella that examines the nature and effect of paparazzi.
